DOC.brief_summary: This research study assess effect two different program weight , body composition , mobility improve health . Measures health include functional ability , physical performance . The 2 program test provided physical activity program include aerobic activity resistance ( weight ) training . The intervention study last 1 year follow-up 6 month yearly phone call thereafter .
